name: Hands Of Hate @ Wolverhampton Bar Civic 14th March
description: Modern Metal/Hardcore band from Bury St. Edmunds, Suffolk! signed to Thirty Days of Night Records (Azriel, Dead Swans and prev. BMTH) This is colour formed in the summer 2005, but endured the usual line up until more recently. in the beginning of 2006 they found themselves working on a new demo, always writing,playing,tweaking and weaving the new material and ideas into the extent demo. they said they ” we recorded in a shed and our guitarist Keir mixed it, regardless how it sounds we’re all happy that we got to personalise as much as we wanted.” in between recording the band have been out on the road with the likes of the black dehlia murder, three inches of blood and underoath . and from all this hard work that the lads have put into their writing of there demo album a breif demonstration saw the lads finding themselves being signed up to thirty days of night records. and now thay are to play wolverhampton little civic with. Bloodshed Betrayal, Silence At Sundouwn, against the fall and Many Things Untold

name: Silence At Sundown E.P
description: Silence At Sundown have just come out the recording studio with this stunning 4 track E.P containg the most popular song death before dishonour
